description: This jacket is packed with powerful technologies that keep you warm, dry, and protected in cold, stormy conditions. Its Omni-Heat™ Infinity technology features an expanded thermal-reflective pattern that retains more body heat without sacrificing breathability. Mountain-ready details include a ski pass, goggle pockets, and an adjustable powder skirt.
name: Columbia Sportswear Aerial Ascender Jacket - Big - Mens
